english_example_sentence: I must have followed that interesting story carefully, like a detective.
russian_example_sentence: Я, должно быть, внимательно следил за этой интересной историей, как детектив.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben, o ilginç hikayeyi, dedektif gibi dikkatle takip etmişim.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben, o ilginç hikayeyi, dedektif gibi dikkatle ______.
